message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 10% of the loot, but be warned: inflation is a real thing!
I'm willing to take a bit more, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm not going to give you all the money, Bob!  But I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
Time to get serious, Alice. I'm not budging on this one!
